name: Astrolabbia
description:
Astrolabbia is a game about space exploration. Pilote a spaceship and explore a star cluster.

Use scientific instruments to measure stellar properties:

Compositions

Temperatures

Magnetic fields

Age

Stellar winds

Use scientific instruments to study planets:

Planetary atmospheres

Planetary surface temperatures

Radiation belts

Upgrade your ship and scientific equipment.

Future plans:

Pulsars and supernova remnants

Asteroid fields

Space factories and asteroid mining

Space laboratories and space science experiments

Advanced space and ground-based observatories
